originalMessageContent:
> **Extension Name:**
> AnimePahe
> 
> **Version:**
> v1.0.1
> 
> **GitHub Repository / Download Link:**
> [Click Here](https://github.com/SyntaxSama/seanime-marketplace/blob/main/manifest.json)  / Copy the link below: 
> `@`@`https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SyntaxSama/seanime-marketplace/refs/heads/main/manifest.json`@`@`
> **Description:**
> Extension for AnimePahe, an online streaming provider for subbed/dubbed anime in English
> 
> **Additional Notes:**
> Rahim has officially handed me the keys to maintaining the AnimePahe extension and it will no longer exist as a default provider. You can read more about this here:
> [Click Here For Rahim's Statement About AnimePahe.](https://discord.com/channels/1224767201551192224/1224767201551192227/1431629684612923422)

> **Description:**

> 
> **Additional Notes:**
> Share any extra details, acknowledgments, or troubleshooting tips.

> **Extension Name:**
> Seanime Banner Remover
> 
> **Version:**
> 1.0.0
> 
> **GitHub Repository / Download Link:**
> [Click Here](https://github.com/Bas1874/Banner-Remover/blob/main/src/manifest.json)  / Copy the link below: 
> ```https://github.com/Bas1874/Banner-Remover/blob/main/src/manifest.json```
> **Description:**
> A plugin to hide banner images on various pages.
> 
> **Additional Notes:**
> Want to use a CSS Snippet instead? <#1400105892858560512>
>
